original_text: On the west side, the Mediterranean Sea is the border of your land. It goes north to a place on the west side of Lebo-Hamath. That is the north border of your land.
korean_text: 서쪽은 대해라 남쪽 경계선에서부터 맞은쪽 하맛 어귀까지 이르나니 이는 그 서쪽이니라

sentences.original_text: the Mediterranean Sea is the border of your land
sentences.korean_translation: 지중해가 너희 땅의 경계가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: to a place on the west side of Lebo-Hamath
That is the north border of your land
